ContributorModal.otherContributed: This person has not made any plugins. They likely {hyperLink} to Vencord in other ways!

ReloadRequiredCard.info: Restart now to apply new plugins and their settings
ReloadRequiredCard.pluginInfo: Press the cog wheel or info icon to get more info on a plugin
ReloadRequiredCard.settings: Plugins with a cog wheel have settings you can modify!

ExcludedPluginsList.web: Vesktop app and the Web version of Discord
ExcludedPluginsList.noPluginsFound: No plugins meet the search criteria.

PluginSettings.info: The following plugins require a restart:
PluginSettings.vencordRequired: This plugin is required for Vencord to function.

SettingsTab.title: Plugins
SettingsTab.noPluginsFound: No plugins meet the search criteria.

PluginModal.noPluginSettings: There are no settings for this plugin.
PluginModal.errorInfoComponent: An error occurred while rendering this plugin's custom InfoComponent
PluginModal.fixErrors: You must fix all errors before saving

BackupAndRestoreTab.warningInfo: Importing a settings file will overwrite your current settings.
BackupAndRestoreTab.importExportInfo: You can import and export your Vencord settings as a JSON file. This allows you to easily transfer your settings to another device, or recover your settings after reinstalling Vencord or Discord.

eraseAllData.eraseFailed: Could not erase all data (API returned {status}), please contact support.

SettingsSyncSection.syncInfo: Synchronize your settings to the cloud. This allows easy synchronization across multiple devices with minimal effort
SettingsSyncSection.overwriteSettings: This will overwrite your local settings with the ones on the cloud. Use wisely!

CloudTab.title: Vencord Cloud
CloudTab.integrationInfo: Vencord comes with a cloud integration that adds goodies like settings sync across devices. It {privacyRespect}, and the {sourceCode} is AGPL 3.0 licensed so you can host it yourself.
CloudTab.authInfo: This will request authorization if you have not yet set up cloud integrations.
CloudTab.backedInfo: Which backend to use when using cloud integrations.
CloudTab.eraseWarning: Once your data is erased, we cannot recover it. There's no going back!

ReloadRequiredCard.info: Restart now to apply the selected Language
ReloadRequiredCard.changeInfo: Here you can change the language of Vencord.
ReloadRequiredCard.notOfficial: This is not an official translation of Vencord.

NotificationSettings.permDeniedText: You have denied Notification Permissions. Thus, Desktop notifications will not work!
NotificationSettings.notificationsInfo: Some plugins may show you notifications. These come in two styles:
NotificationSettings.desktopNotificationInfo: Native Desktop notifications (like when you get a ping)
NotificationSettings.onlyWhenUnfocused: Only use Desktop notifications when Discord is not focused
NotificationSettings.timeoutNotifInfo: Set to 0s to never automatically time out
NotificationSettings.logNotifInfo: The amount of notifications to save in the log until old ones are removed. Set to {code0} to disable Notification log and {infinity} to never automatically remove old Notifications

PatchHelperTab.noMatch: No match. Perhaps that module is lazy loaded?
PatchHelperTab.multipleMatches: Multiple matches. Please refine your filter

ReplacementInput.regexId: Special regex escape sequence that matches identifiers (varnames, classnames, etc.)
ReplacementInput.substringBeforeMatch: Insert the substring before the match
ReplacementInput.substringAfterMatch: Insert the substring after the match
ReplacementInput.evaledReplacement: 'replacement' will be evaled if this is toggled

PatchHelperTab.pasteJson: Paste your full JSON patch here to fill out the fields

shared.failedRenderTab: Failed to render the {tab} tab. If this issue persists, try using the installer to reinstall!

Validators.themesSuccessLoad: This section will tell you whether your themes can successfully be loaded

renderLocalThemes.BDInfo: If using the BD site, click on "Download" and place the downloaded .theme.css file into your themes folder.

renderOnlineThemes.cssLink: Paste links to css files here
renderOnlineThemes.linesPrefix: You can prefix lines with @light or @dark to toggle them based on your Discord theme
renderOnlineThemes.directLinks: Make sure to use direct links to files (raw or github.io)!

Newer.localCopyWarning: Your local copy has more recent commits. Please stash or reset them.

Updater.title: Vencord Updater
Updater.autoUpdateInfo: Automatically update Vencord without confirmation prompt
Updater.autoUpdateNotifInfo: Shows a notification when Vencord automatically updates
Updater.autoUpdateNotif: Get notified when an automatic update completes

Switches.winNativeTitleBarTitle: Use Windows' native title bar instead of Discord's custom one
Switches.transparentNote: You need a theme that supports transparency or this will do nothing. WILL STOP THE WINDOW FROM BEING RESIZABLE!! Requires a full restart
Switches.winCtrlQTitle: Register Ctrl+Q as shortcut to close Discord (Alternative to Alt+F4)
